meanings.definition: The act of finding or learning something for the first time.
meanings.sent1: Her discovery of a hidden treasure brought her great joy.
meanings.sent2: The scientist's discovery of a new species amazed the world.
meanings.sent3: The discovery of a talking parrot in the library made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His discovery of inner peace was like finding a rare gem in a chaotic world.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of a magical portal in the forest was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A new finding or piece of information.
meanings.sent1: The latest discovery in the case shed new light on the mystery.
meanings.sent2: The archaeological discovery of ancient artifacts fascinated historians.
meanings.sent3: The discovery of a secret recipe for happiness made her day.
meanings.sent4: Her discovery of a hidden talent was like uncovering a precious gem.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of a rare flower species was a moment of pure wonder.

meanings.definition: The process of exploring or uncovering something previously unknown.
meanings.sent1: The discovery of new lands by explorers changed the course of history.
meanings.sent2: Scientific discovery often involves years of dedicated research.
meanings.sent3: The discovery of a hidden shortcut through the forest saved them time.
meanings.sent4: Her discovery of a hidden talent was like finding a treasure map.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of an ancient civilization was a journey through time.
